BasicSpectrogram

Source: R/audio_core_config.R
BasicSpectrogram.Rd

BasicSpectrogram

BasicSpectrogram(
  n_fft = 400,
  win_length = NULL,
  hop_length = NULL,
  pad = 0,
  window_fn = torch()$hann_window,
  power = 2,
  normalized = FALSE,
  wkwargs = NULL,
  mel = FALSE,
  to_db = TRUE
)

Arguments

n_fft

number of fast fourier transforms

win_length

windowing length

hop_length

hopping length

pad

padding mode

window_fn

window function

power

power

normalized

normalized or not

wkwargs

additional arguments

mel

mel-spectrogram or not

to_db

to decibels

Value

None
